name: the aspen loop bag
notes:
description:
the aspen loop bag is a cute and classic purse to add to your collection! itâ€™s worked in one large piece for easy construction. the looped strap allows you to carry it as a cross-body or 2 handle purse!

get the [free version of the pattern on my blog!][1]

[the aspen loop bag is available as a kit with lion brand!][2] the kit comes with the digital pdf pattern + all the yarn needed to make your bag! you can even customize your yarn color.

need some extra help? the aspen loop bag has a full video tutorial!


  [1]: https://www.eandpcrochet.com/aspen-loop-bag/
  [2]: http://shrsl.com/3447d
